Title: Relates to community health assessment reporting
Summary: Requires every municipality to submit to the department of health a community health assessment in alignment with the state health improvement plan cycle and no more frequently than every six years; removes requirement of a community health assessment no more frequently that every two years.
LawCode: Amd ยง602-a, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to community health assessment reporting
